snippet: Netflix said its message was one of many ways it is testing to notify customers about how their viewing experience is affected by their Internet service provider’s network.
abstract: Netflix says message it shows users blaming Verizon for congestion that slows streaming video is simply one of many ways the company is notifying its customers about how their viewing experience is affected by their Internet service provider's network.
lead_paragraph: Netflix said its message was one of many ways it is testing to notify customers about how their viewing experience is affected by their Internet service provider’s network.

headline.main: Netflix Points at Verizon for Delays in Streaming
headline.print_headline: Netflix Points at Verizon for Delays in Streaming
